title: South America: physical geography
brief_description: South America : a continent with high mountains, vast plains and large pleateaus, tropical rain forests, and barren deserts. This film highlights the diverse landforms, climates, and vegetation of the fourth largest continent. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary level students. Teacher’s Guide included.
